alps.doc: ALPS document for existing "Roll Dice as a Service" API (see URL in the help link for native API service). "Have you ever needed to roll dice and have no dice? Do you need to automate the rolling of dice? Do you need some time to kill? I obviously did."

descriptor.doc: Identfier for a die. This value is created by the consumer app and has a very specific non-opaque format: NdP where: - N is an integer indicating the number of rolls to execute - d is a fixed constant - P is an integer indicating the max number of "pips" or dots on a single side
Sum total of adding the value of all the rolls of the die
An array of integers indicating the value assigned to each roll of the die
Service MAY return one or more "results" blocks.
Client apps MAY pass one or more "dice" values.
